1.1.0: Fixed Lightorio Incompability, added update checker
1.1.2: Fixed problem with save files with spaces in the names
1.2.0: Fixed problem with mod names with symbols, added changelog
2.0.0: Added HD mode, allow more zoom levels in general
2.1.0: Block all 404 requests, The client now knows exactly which images exist (Breaks old maps)
2.2.0: Significantly increased image quality and file size at the cost of some processing time
2.4.0: Fixed a bug in the image deduplicator
2.4.1: Added a simple gui with instructions
3.0.0: Tags can now be seen on the map!
3.0.1: Added flags to set maximum threads used
3.1.1: !Fixed bugs when no mod path is specified
3.1.2: !Fixed bug where the entire script-output folder is sometimes removed due to inconsistent symlink behavior
3.2.0: !Considerable speedup for most users that haven't bothered changing the factorio config.ini
3.3.1: Fixed a bug where some parts of the map could be missing if multiple factions were used
3.4.0: Separated map tags to surface and snapshot level
3.5.0: !Added API for integration with i.a. Factorissimo
3.5.1: Removed dependency on package that isnt being updated anymore
3.6.0: Fixed bug when dealing with near empty factorio config files
Allow running for any working directory
Added option to output to any directory
